        Parses the (string) value of a property and determines whether it is true
        Parameters:
        properties - The properties to search
        property - The property to evaluate
        Returns:

      • getIntOrDefault

                                  String property,
                                  int defaultInt)
        Parses the (string) value of a property and determines its integer value
        Parameters:
        properties - The properties to search
        property - The property to evaluate
        defaultInt - The default if the property is missing
        Returns:
        The integer value if parseable, or the default, otherwise

      • getString

        Parses the (string) value of a property and determines its string value

        property - The property to evaluate
        Returns:

        Type Parameters:
        T - An enum type
        Parameters:
        properties - The properties to search
        property - The property to evaluate
        enumClass - The class of enum to return
